fields.name: CacheNetBiosName
fields.description: The NetBIOS name to assign to the HPC Cache when it joins the Active Directory domain as a server. Length must 1-15 characters from the class [-0-9a-zA-Z].

fields.name: Credentials
fields.description: Active Directory admin credentials used to join the HPC Cache to a domain.

fields.name: DomainJoined
fields.description: True if the HPC Cache is joined to the Active Directory domain.

fields.name: DomainName
fields.description: The fully qualified domain name of the Active Directory domain controller.

fields.name: DomainNetBiosName
fields.description: The Active Directory domain's NetBIOS name.

fields.name: PrimaryDnsIPAddress
fields.description: Primary DNS IP address used to resolve the Active Directory domain controller's fully qualified domain name.

fields.name: SecondaryDnsIPAddress
fields.description: Secondary DNS IP address used to resolve the Active Directory domain controller's fully qualified domain name.
